# Feature Request — CCG Standard

## 1. Summary
A concise explanation of the requested feature.

## 2. Problem to Solve
What limitation, gap, or need does this feature address?

## 3. Proposed Solution
Describe the preferred solution clearly and minimally.

## 4. Alternative Approaches
List alternative solutions considered, if any.

## 5. Dependencies / Impact
Does this affect architecture, modules, or integrations?

## 6. Additional Notes
Include any technical context, diagrams, or references.
